## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                  | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | Icon to be rendered. View accepted values on text documentation.                                                             | `string` | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | OPTIONAL. Size of the Icon. {xs, sm, md, lg}                                                                                 | `string` | `md`        |
